docs.lead_paragraph: Issues over self-acceptance among female tennis players persist, compelling many of them to avoid bulking up.
docs.abstract: Many top female tennis players try to avoid becoming muscular because they feel it does not look feminine but some, like Serena Williams, take pride in their bulk and strength.

headline.main: Tennis’s Top Women Balance Body Image With Ambition
